name: Color Lion
description:
In Color Lion, you play as a lion who can change his color. Fabulous, isn't it?

This is an entry for LowRezJam 2022, which means that the game is designed to work on a 64x64 pixels canvas. But you can play it in fullscreen, too.

Instructions

To play the game on fullscreen, click on the arrows with the blue background:

Left and right arrow keys change the color of the lion. Lion's color must match the rings' colors. Jump with up arrow key.

Gamepad is supported!

Credits

Pixel Art: "Kuymak"
